RULES.RULE: (DEVICE_FAMILY != CBXI_DEVICE_FAMILY) and !m_fusion_spl_case and !m_altdqs_spl_case and !m_dq_dqs_titan and !m_altclkctrl_titan and !m_similar_family

(m_function_name == altsyncram) and m_dual_clock_dual_port and m_pre_51_version and mfam_family_cycloneii_strict(DEVICE_FAMILY) and mfam_family_cycloneii_strict(CBXI_DEVICE_FAMILY) and (CYCLONEII_M4K_COMPATIBILITY != "OFF")

(m_function_name == altsyncram) and (OPERATION_MODE == BIDIR_DUAL_PORT) and (ADDRESS_REG_B == "CLOCK1") and (INIT_FILE != "") and (INIT_FILE != "UNUSED") and (CYCLONEII_M4K_COMPATIBILITY != "OFF") and (CYCLONEII_SAFE_WRITE == "RESTRUCTURE") and mfam_family_cycloneii_strict(DEVICE_FAMILY) and mfam_family_cycloneii_strict(CBXI_DEVICE_FAMILY)
(m_function_name == altlvds_rx) and m_pre_81_version and mfam_family_stratixiii(CBXI_DEVICE_FAMILY) and is_used(rx_dpa_locked)

MESSAGE.THEN: For the PLL reconfiguration mechanism to function correctly, regenerate the altpll_reconfig megafunction. Refer the PLL Reconfiguration Application Note (AN 367 for Stratix II / AN 282 for Stratix) for more details.
The Altdqs megafunction was not generated for the current device family. Use the megawizard to regenerate the design for the current device family
For the PLL reconfiguration mechanism to function correctly, regenerate the altpll_reconfig megafunction and any associated MIF files with the current version of Quartus II software.

MESSAGE.IF: (m_function_name == altlvds_rx) and m_pre_80_version and mfam_family_stratixiii(CBXI_DEVICE_FAMILY) and is_used(rx_dpa_locked) and (USE_EXTERNAL_PLL == ON)
MESSAGE.THEN: The Altlvds_rx megafunction needs rx_syncclock (which is the slow clock from PLL running at data rate/DESERIALIZATION_FACTOR) and pll_areset (PLL locked output from the corresponding Altpll megafunction instance must be inverted and connected to pll_areset) to be connected to use the DPA lock feature in external PLL mode for the current device family
The Alt2gxb_reconfig/Altgx_reconfig megafunction was not generated for the current device family. Use the megawizard to regenerate the design for the current device family

MESSAGE.IF: (m_function_name == alt2gxb_reconfig || m_function_name == alt4gxb) and mfam_family_stratixiv(DEVICE_FAMILY) and m_pre_90_version and !m_siv_aii_old_designs_allowed
MESSAGE.THEN: The altgx megafunction or altgx_reconfig megafunction entity file ${CBXI_FILE_NAME} was generated using an earlier version of the Quartus II software. This instance may not be compatible with the current version of the Quartus II software. Regenerate the instance with the current version of the Quartus II software.
